member.name: IBrowserService2.Offline
member.summary: Deprecated. Checks for and updates the browser's offline status, synchronizing the state between the base class and any derived classes.

param.name: iCmd
param.para: One of the following commands.
Queries the offline state. The method's return value contains the answer.
Toggles the offline state.

member.returns: In the case of SBSC_TOGGLE, returns standard error codes. In the case of SBSC_QUERY, returns S_OK if offline, S_FALSE otherwise.

member.name: IBrowserService2.OnCommand
member.summary: Deprecated. Calls the derived class from the base class on receipt of a WM_COMMAND message. The derived class handles the message.

param.name: wParam
param.para: Additional information taken from the WM_COMMAND message. The high-order word specifies the notification code if the message is from a control. If the message is from an accelerator, this value is 1. If the message is from a menu, this value is zero.
The low-order word specifies the identifier of the menu item, control, or accelerator.

member.param: Additional information taken from the WM_COMMAND message. Handle to the control sending the message if the message is from a control. Otherwise, this parameter is NULL.
member.returns: The return value specifies the result of the command processing; it depends on the command sent.

member.name: IBrowserService2._NavigateToPidl
member.summary: Deprecated. Navigates the base class to a new location synchronously.
member.param: The PIDL identifying the new location.

param.name: grfHLNF
param.para: The value or values from the HLNF enumeration. The following values are also supported.
0x00200000. The navigation was possibly initiated through a webpage by scripting code already on the system.
0x00400000. The navigation allows ActiveX prompts.
0x00800000. The new window is created by a URL in a zone that has the window restrictions security mitigation disabled.
0x01000000. The new window is the result of a user-initiated action. If the destination attempts a download on entry, it should be trusted.
0x02000000. Internet Explorer is navigating to an untrusted non-HTML file. Do not download the file.
0x04000000. This navigation should not automatically select the history folder.
0x08000000. This navigation should not be recorded in the history.
0x80000000. If this navigation results in a new window, the new window should be subject to the Pop-up Manager.

member.param: Not used.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IBrowserService2
member.summary: Deprecated. IBrowserService2 extends . The methods exposed by this interface are analogous to virtual protected methods in normal C++ inheritance. The objects' inheritance hierarchy spans multiple DLLs. The hierarchy is made up of a base class and several derived classes that correspond to controls including CLSID_WebBrowser and the user's desktop. Objects not in the hierarchy should not implement this interface or use most of its methods.
